summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganThe about-face Matte Fix Lip Pencil is a glide-on matte, creamy liner that defines lips for 7+ hours while delivering bold, buildable color.
details: DetailsBenefitsInfused with a unique mix of vitamins C & E and moisture-locking hyaluronic acid spheres, this pencil delivers buildable color while keeping lips soft and smooth.FeaturesAll about-face products are 100% veganItem 2604684How To UseFor a subtle lipstick look:After creating your desired lip shape, tilt the pencil at an angle and gently glide across lips.Lock in with a coat of your favorite lip balm, or for a pop of shine, top with a swipe of Light Lock Lip Gloss in shade ''Not All At Once''For a defined Cupid's bow:Draw an ''X'' with your pencil. Start at the highest point on one side of your lip and draw a diagonal line along the inner curve of your lip.Repeat on the other side. 3. Apply lip color, making sure to stay within the lines.NOTE:Your Matte Fix Lip Pencil can be sharpened with any standard cosmetic sharpener.IngredientsIsododecane, polybutene, synthetic wax, trimethylsiloxysilicate, hydrogenated jojoba oil, isoamyl laurate, silica, sucrose tetrastearate triacetate, cetearyl behenate, ascorbyl palmitate, butylene glycol, caffeine, caprylyl glycol, ethylhexyl palmitate, hexylene glycol, mica, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, silica dimethyl silylate, sodium hyaluronate, synthetic fluorphlogopite, phenoxyethanol, [may contain/peut contenir: titanium dioxide (CI 77891), iron oxides (CI 77492), iron oxides (CI 77491), iron oxides (CI 77499).
how_to_use: For a subtle lipstick look:After creating your desired lip shape, tilt the pencil at an angle and gently glide across lips.Lock in with a coat of your favorite lip balm, or for a pop of shine, top with a swipe of Light Lock Lip Gloss in shade ''Not All At Once''For a defined Cupid's bow:Draw an ''X'' with your pencil. Start at the highest point on one side of your lip and draw a diagonal line along the inner curve of your lip.Repeat on the other side. 3. Apply lip color, making sure to stay within the lines.NOTE:Your Matte Fix Lip Pencil can be sharpened with any standard cosmetic sharpener.

reviews.headline: Love the color
reviews.comments: Last month, I recently purchased About Face's Matte FIx Lip Pencil in the shade of Backseat Love. It's a cool pink shade that compliments my skin well. Easy to apply to line lips with the pencil. It stays on, and works well with any pigmentation. I would check out more colors from them into the future.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Only long lasting lip liner i own

reviews.headline: Love this lip liner
reviews.comments: Very smooth and creamy, easy to apply

reviews.headline: So creamy
reviews.comments: Love this lip liner and shade

reviews.headline: Just too matte
reviews.comments: I purchased this online at half off because the color Lost Time (matte red wine) looked gorgeous- and it is. Unfortunately, it's TOO matte and applies very clumpy- leaving blobs of color that are very VERY hard to blend. Other matte lip pencils I own are not this difficult to use. I used this a few times and then put it aside and forgot about it until recently. Tried it again and the issues persist. I am going to try using it over a layer of lip balm to make it work because I already own it but I would not buy it again and do not recommend it.

reviews.headline: So good! After Party = Nude Truffle Nyx
reviews.comments: Love this lipliner! I was looking for a replacement for my favorite Nyx Nude truffle lipliner (since they changed the formula) and came across this. The formula is like if kylie lip liners came in wearable shades.

reviews.headline: favorite
reviews.comments: it is pigmented and more on the dry side, but thats what i love. it stays on ALL day. i wore it to a party last night and it stayed through eating, drinking, etc.. still had a mauve color on my lips this morning. definitely buying more shades.

reviews.headline: very dry and difficult to blend
reviews.comments: i love the color and how pigmented it is but ive found it to be very difficult to blend on my lips, and it doesnt last very long either

reviews.headline: Creamy, nice matte liner
reviews.comments: I have After Party, and this is one of my favorite lip liners. It is smooth and creamy. Easy to apply but lasts quite well.

reviews.headline: Creamy, nice matte liner
reviews.comments: I have After Party, and this is one of my favorite lip liners. It is smooth and creamy. Easy to apply but lasts quite well.

reviews.headline: Better than "prestige" brands!
reviews.comments: I tested several lasting lip pencils to compare them to $$$ brands & this is the ONE! I only wear lipliner and use it to fill in my lips & the staying power on this is legit. I fell asleep with this lipliner on & the next morning it was still on!

reviews.headline: The worst lip pencil I've ever tried
reviews.comments: This lip pencil crumbles every time I use it. I then have to sharpen it, which results in more crumbling and falling apart. The only good thing I can say is that it's pretty pigmented and soft, but you might as well apply the lip liner with your fingers because it's impossible to line your lips even once with this pencil without it falling apart and making a huge mess.

reviews.headline: Not easy to blend and crumble
reviews.comments: I tried giving these lip pencils a try the first time It was easy to use . I sharpened them and now they're impossible to blend they set quick so you have to work fast with these. It just sits on your lips it doesnt blend at all and it makes a mess and they crumble if you try to apply more . They also slide off with lip oils and glosses. The shades are stunnning tho.

reviews.headline: One of the best lip liners I've tried
reviews.comments: These go on so easily for being matte and the pigment is amazing. These are very long lasting too. Midnight Seduction and Little Little are my favorites!

reviews.headline: Midnight seduction
reviews.comments: Fair redhead here, midnight seduction looks SO good, the liner is super creamy, i just got it today so i cant talk about how long it lasts. The color is like a darker pinkish red. Ik it looks brown on here but it doesnt irl

reviews.headline: A great lip pencil.
reviews.comments: This lip pencil is a massive favorite, if not my favorite lip pencil. I have two colors - Love Like a Sunset and Lost Time - which are equally very soft, creamy, yet matte. The lid on the pencils closes really tightly, keeping the pencil from drying and opening with a really satisfying pop sound. The pencils are very easy to sharpen (make sure your sharpener isn't dull, y'all), and stick not too tight or too loosely to the lips. Overall, zero regrets, will probably repurchase more.

reviews.headline: It's okie
reviews.comments: I just couldn't find a color I loved on my lips and could find a color I wanted and love at a cheaper price. It's cute but not a must.

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: I really love these! They are so creamy and pigmented, and they last fairly long. The mauve-brown shade is one of my favorites. These do move with a gloss or oil on top, and in that case they will slide right off. They are a little drying

reviews.headline: HALSEY!!! This product is so good
reviews.comments: Love how this product does not blend in with my lipgloss. Mind you if you wanted that look you can, but I like a dark lipliner with a light lipgloss and OMG this product doesn't budge. 100% worth it!

reviews.headline: Smears off with lipgloss
reviews.comments: I purchased the shade Smoked and it looks more plum than brown and it looks so pretty on the lips. I noticed the lipliner slides off with my lip oil . Im going to keep trying it with other lipsticks and lipglosses hopefully it doesnt do the same . They are very pigmented and blend nice I just didnt like that it smudged off with another lip product.

faceoff_positive.comments: I got the color Smoking Room and at first was a bit uncomfortable with how nostalgic it made me for my freshman year of high school and the EXACT shade of brown we used to line our lips with for every üëè single üëè shadeüëè until i realized there was a reason we did that, because it looks the business and now i can't remember why i stoppedü§£ **back to Smoking Room** on top of all those feels, the texture feels almost like liquid and once it's on it does not move. And i speak as one of who's lips naturally crease at the corners. At the end of the day i had a tad bit of creasing, after eating, drinking, obsessively wiping my mouth with a napkin (the corners thing) compared to after the first time i take a sip of anything with most other brands. So this is my new favorite thing in the world.
faceoff_positive.headline: So. Much. Love. üíú

faceoff_negative.comments: I like these liners a lot. But once I need to sharpen one of them I have to stick it in the jumbo side of my sharpener & whittle away at it like a darn wood carver & pray I don't waste even more product as it just keeps crumbling & crumbling. I've tried multiple sharpeners. I'm glad I got these through someone's PR box cuz what a waste of product from all these failed attempts at sharpening these liners. About Face...please come out with a sharpener specifically for your lip liners. Cuz I can't find one that it'll fit in. They're just that teeny bit too small just like every gel liner I've tried ( unless it's a mechanical one or whatever they're called & don't need to be sharpened ) *sigh*
faceoff_negative.headline: Great...until you need to sharpen it.
